body: @firepulser that's the best kind of loli hentai
honestly i would have used her mom as blackmail and got her cherry before the kid did

I'm not sure why this mangaka always feels the need to destroy the virginity/innocence of loli in the beginning of the story before he starts the main part of the story. The appeal of lolis is appearance of innocense, or cuteness. If you use the story intro to make her out to be a slut who would let any man in-between her legs if he asked, you kill some of the attraction. Really sours the story.  Story goes from great to okay and not worth a favorite.
